Changeset.Change: First release
Added multiple encoding support
Improved pager in order to work both in the presence and in the absence of OpenSearch response elements
Improved element extensibility pattern. Factories are now constructed dynamically, based on a mapping residing in the configuration class
Fixed a bug which caused the operator to ignore response query elements
Fixed a bug that could result in the omission of certain records in providers for which the startIndex parameter is used for paging
Fixed a minor bug which could cause problems if an XSLT was attempted to be added in the XSLT cache of an ISOpenSearchResource when caching is disabled
Corrected result counting logic in the case of brokered providers with the result limit enabled
Improved namespace lookup in query elements and attributes
Whitespace is trimmed away from integral and other non-textual elements and attributes
Corrected a constant typo that could prevent the startIndex attribute of query elements from being initialized.
Enabled fixed parameter processing for direct providers in addition to brokered ones
Fixed a bug in the query parser which prevented parameters containing space from being properly parsed
Made some corrections in extensibility mechanism
Added library extensions for Geo and Time OpenSearch extensions
Reserved characters are replaced in unique identifier elements
Ported to latest version of GRS2
Added SRU OpenSearch extension
OpenSearch resources now handle presentation information
Updated result production to support presentable fields
Fixed bug which prevented result extraction from empty presentable fields
Fixed xml namespace handling in xpath evaluation
Added parameter information to OpenSearchResource construct in order to support automatic field update
Aligned with latest version of gRS2
Turned to Maven
Java logger replaced by slf4
Minor bug fixes.
